positive.review: The best crosshair overlay tool out there without any performance loss, you can create whatever you dream of, you can select the display you want to use and I never had a problem with it. I use it mainly for Hunt showdown to create a little white dot in the center with a black border it makes it so the game looks smoother with the small black outline around it - to have a faster aim down sights advantage for fast not fully aimed in headshots.

a very good custom crosshair application that I used to use for the game left 4 dead 2.  it was a very popular pick among my friends as well so i'd strongly recommend to anyone questioning if they should purchase this specific crosshair app that they do so
Can be used for any first person shooters. You can add a keybind to toggle on and off mid game if needed. Would recommend if the game you're playing has crosshairs you don't like.
Great tool, lots of customization options, essentially no impact on processing power, 10/10

Nothing much to say. Great app for using an overlay crosshair. You can customize it, center it, do whatever you'd like. Let's you even draw your own. Has low usage on CPU and Memory. Got it 2 years ago and it still works great.
great reticle for monitors. highly recommend
Sometimes it bugs a little but it aight
W software. makes you wanna touch a butter ball turkey if yk what I mean
best crosshair ever i recomend this

a very good custom crosshair application that I used to use for the game left 4 dead 2.  it was a very popular pick among my friends as well so i'd strongly recommend to anyone questioning if they should purchase this specific crosshair app that they do so
Can be used for any first person shooters. You can add a keybind to toggle on and off mid game if needed. Would recommend if the game you're playing has crosshairs you don't like.
Great tool, lots of customization options, essentially no impact on processing power, 10/10

Nothing much to say. Great app for using an overlay crosshair. You can customize it, center it, do whatever you'd like. Let's you even draw your own. Has low usage on CPU and Memory. Got it 2 years ago and it still works great.
Got this for SCUM. Cross hairs would disappear in game and this allows for it to be permanent. Love this app.

It's cool, gets you a crosshair for games. Sometimes it doesn't work, so it isn't consistent.
basically, it's good when it works.
The software is pretty useful in games that have no settings for crosshair.
Great app. Wouldnt use any other safe crosshair overlay! :D Have a great day.
THe bestest crossair. even comes with a menu. made me win many fights #smuggled
GREAT FOR DROP SHOTTING, GREAT FOR HARD AIMING ON REARMED I WOULD TELL ANYONE TRYING TO GET INTO REARMED DAYZ PVP TO TRY IT BUT DONT CHALL ME OR DA MAN!!
great reticle for monitors. highly recommend

not even a hour of usage and i already prefer this over crosshair x, the editor is slightly worse (would like to have layers like crosshair x) but hudsight is more lightweight and doesnt require you to use trashy xbox overlay to use with exclusive fullscreen
Very useful if the crosshair is too small and for games that has no crosshair
works exactly as described. big library pre-made assets.
Sometimes it bugs a little but it aight
W software. makes you wanna touch a butter ball turkey if yk what I mean
best crosshair ever i recomend this
a return to form, ill probably get 5/600 hours of this. ::thumbs up::
I REALLY like this little green dot
Works as intended vs cross hair X
